channel.title: AISee on AICUE DATA LAB - Enabling decision making in manufacturing industry with AI
channel.description: Recent content in AISee on AICUE DATA LAB - Enabling decision making in manufacturing industry with AI

item.title: Audit Readiness Made Simple — Show Numbers, Not Narratives
item.description:
Audits often come down to one big question: Can you demonstrate improvement?
Most shop floors struggle here — safety logs are inconsistent, and human observation is unreliable over long periods.

AISee changes that.
Every deviation is logged automatically, along with time-stamped images and compliance percentages.
When an auditor asks, you don’t show manual registers — you show data, charts, and trends.

Benefits

  • Real-time, quantitative evidence for safety compliance
  • Automatic monthly and quarterly summaries
  • Visual proof of CAPA (Corrective and Preventive Actions) effectiveness

AISee gives you the ability to say with confidence:

item.title: Turning Safety into Measurable Metrics with AISee
item.description:
For years, safety audits have relied on manual observations and checklists — difficult to sustain and nearly impossible to measure objectively.
With AISee, shop floors now gain measurable, daily metrics for safety adherence using their existing CCTV feeds.

AISee’s Vision-AI technology automatically detects safety gear like helmets, jackets, and goggles, logs compliance by shift, and builds visual trend reports.
Supervisors and managers can see at a glance how safety compliance evolves over time — by workstation, by shift, and by department.
